ygData.subject: New paper on Evolution Rivaling Backprop
ygData.msgSnippet: Greg Morse and I are pleased to announce our new paper to appear at GECCO-16, titled Simple Evolutionary Optimization Can Rival Stochastic Gradient Descent in
